mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO combination (batch_id, combine_number, combine_cost, path, path_cost, shared_path, shared_path_cost, created_by) VALUES
(#{item.batchId}, #{item.combineNumber}, #{item.combineCost}, #{item.path}, #{item.pathCost}, #{item.sharedPath}, #{item.sharedPathCost}, #{item.createdBy})
